example: Many were impaired with psychological trauma.

definition: Broadly or completely covering; including a large proportion of something.

definition: Causing grief, pain or sorrow

definition: (transitive) To make known or public.

example: It was not expected that we would live without transgressing one law or another.

definition: (transitive) To exceed or overstep some limit or boundary.

definition: (transitive) To assist or encourage by aid or countenance, especially in crime.

example_meaning: Thằng nhóc tốt mã chỉ ra vẻ phớt đời từ khi nó 15 tuổi....
definition: Seemingly well-reasoned or factual, but actually fallacious or insincere; strongly held but false.

definition: Any loud and joyous song; a song of triumph.

definition: To bury in a grave.

definition: To contradict; to deny, refute; to controvert; to dispute; to forbid.

definition: Eternal damnation.

definition: To scold, reprimand or criticize harshly.
